subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Sailboats and Sailing
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Peter Sowrey said that he had been fired because he pushed to move events for this year’s Olympics in Rio de Janeiro from polluted Guanabara Bay.
snippet: Peter Sowrey said that he had been fired because he pushed to move events for this year’s Olympics in Rio de Janeiro from polluted Guanabara Bay.
